overview: A spirited celebration of youthful exuberance and the excitement of shooting with a movie camera. Jonathan Langran, then a young film student in 1960s London, films an evening escapade with friends including filmmakers David Larcher and Simon Hartog, which concludes with a meal in Dinoâ€™s restaurant. Although shot late at night, the streets of this cosmopolitan neighbourhood are bustling with activity.
title: Gloucester Road Groove
